items.title: Enable Full Panel
items.subtitle: This enables a full panel which is more customizable but heavier on resources.

items.title: Enable Tray Icons
items.subtitle: Enables indicator icons often used by apps such as Discord, Steam, Slack, etc.

gsetting.title: Allow Audio Volume Above 100%
gsetting.subtitle:
This allows you to go above 100% volume in the top bar.
WARNING: this may have an impact on audio quality, and potentially could damage your audio hardware.

gsetting.title: Show Favorites Applications
gsetting.subtitle: Pins your favorite apps to the panel.

gsetting.title: Show Favorites Applications on Extra Monitors
gsetting.subtitle: Show favorite apps on the non-primary display.

gsetting.title: Show Running Applications
gsetting.subtitle: Shows running applications on the panel.

gsetting.title: Group Applications
gsetting.subtitle: Groups open applications together, disabling will show the window title of each open applications.

gsetting.title: Show Window Previews on Hover
gsetting.subtitle: Will show a preview of the window when hovering over open windows in the panel.

gsetting.title: Isolate Workspaces
gsetting.subtitle: Only show open windows from the current workspace.

gsetting.title: Isolate Monitors
gsetting.subtitle: Only show open windows from the current monitor.
